metadata.description: Microsoft VibeVoice preset voices - 7 core voices plus 11 English style voices for diverse applications
metadata.author: Microsoft Research

presets.name: Carter
presets.description: Professional male voice with clear, authoritative delivery. Ideal for corporate and business content.
presets.voice_prompt: Professional male voice with clear, authoritative delivery suitable for business contexts

presets.name: Davis
presets.description: Deep, resonant male voice with gravitas. Perfect for narration, documentaries, and premium content.
presets.voice_prompt: Deep, resonant male voice with natural gravitas and premium quality

presets.name: Emma
presets.description: Warm, friendly female voice with natural conversational flow. Great for customer-facing applications.
presets.voice_prompt: Warm, friendly female voice with natural conversational flow and approachable quality

presets.name: Frank
presets.description: Mature male voice with warmth and wisdom. Trustworthy tone suitable for advisory content.
presets.voice_prompt: Mature male voice with warmth and wisdom, conveying trustworthiness

presets.name: Grace
presets.description: Elegant female voice with sophistication and poise. Perfect for luxury brands and refined content.
presets.voice_prompt: Elegant female voice with sophistication and poise for refined content

presets.name: Mike
presets.description: Energetic male voice with enthusiasm and drive. Great for sports, gaming, and action content.
presets.voice_prompt: Energetic male voice with enthusiasm and drive for high-energy content

presets.name: Samuel
presets.description: Indian English male voice with warm, articulate delivery. Professional yet approachable.
presets.voice_prompt: Indian English male voice with warm, articulate delivery and professional demeanor

presets.name: News Anchor
presets.description: Broadcast-quality voice with crisp, authoritative delivery. Perfect for news and announcements.
presets.voice_prompt: Broadcast-quality voice with crisp, authoritative news anchor delivery

presets.name: Warm Storyteller
presets.description: Cozy, engaging voice perfect for bedtime stories and children's content. Gentle and nurturing.
presets.voice_prompt: Cozy, engaging storyteller voice with gentle, nurturing quality
presets.acting_instructions: warm, gentle, engaging, nurturing, slightly slower

presets.name: Podcast Host
presets.description: Conversational voice with natural rhythm and engaging delivery. Perfect for long-form content.
presets.voice_prompt: Conversational podcast host voice with natural rhythm and engaging delivery

presets.name: Tech Explainer
presets.description: Clear, patient voice ideal for technical explanations and tutorials. Makes complex topics accessible.
presets.voice_prompt: Clear, patient voice for technical explanations making complex topics accessible

presets.name: Fitness Coach
presets.description: Motivating, energetic voice that pushes and encourages. Perfect for fitness and wellness apps.
presets.voice_prompt: Motivating, energetic fitness coach voice that pushes and encourages

presets.name: Meditation Guide
presets.description: Serene, calming voice for meditation and mindfulness. Slow, deliberate pacing with gentle tone.
presets.voice_prompt: Serene, calming meditation guide voice with slow, deliberate pacing

presets.name: Executive Briefing
presets.description: Polished, professional voice for high-level business communication. Confident and concise.
presets.voice_prompt: Polished, professional voice for executive-level business communication

presets.name: Friendly Assistant
presets.description: Helpful, approachable voice for AI assistants. Balances professionalism with warmth.
presets.voice_prompt: Helpful, approachable AI assistant voice balancing professionalism with warmth

presets.name: Dramatic Narrator
presets.description: Theatrical voice with dynamic range and emotional depth. Perfect for dramatic content.
presets.voice_prompt: Theatrical voice with dynamic range and emotional depth for dramatic content

presets.name: Cheerful Greeter
presets.description: Upbeat, welcoming voice for greetings and announcements. Creates positive first impressions.
presets.voice_prompt: Upbeat, welcoming voice for greetings that creates positive first impressions

presets.name: Soothing Support
presets.description: Empathetic, calming voice for sensitive topics. Supportive and understanding.
presets.voice_prompt: Empathetic, calming voice for sensitive topics with supportive, understanding quality
